sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hello ${incident.assigned_to.first_name},

I have just completed an incident review for you, ${URI_REF}. Please accept or appeal the review within 7 business days.

Thank you,

${incident.assignment_group.manager.first_name} ${incident.assignment_group.manager.last_name} | ${incident.assignment_group.manager.title}

movement.com

Have I made you a raving fan today? If so, please email Ravingfans@movementmortgage.com

“Movement Mortgage” is a registered trademark of the Movement Mortgage, LLC, and a Delaware limited liability company. Please be aware that e-mail is NOT a secured communication vehicle, and that others may in certain circumstances be able to view its contents. As a result, while we are happy to provide this information by e-mail, we do NOT conduct actual business transactions by e-mail. Please contact the sender directly if you have any concurs about his message. All loans subject to credit approval and property appraisal. Equal Housing Lender. This communication is confidential and propriety business communication. It is intended solely for the use of the designated recipients(s). If this communication is received error, please contact the sender and delete this communication.

Click to view this review in your browser, ${URI_REF}.
sysevent_email_template.name: incident_review_technician_new
sysevent_email_template.subject: ${incident.assignment_group.manager.first_name} has just reviewed your incident ${incident.number}!
